name: Dream in sound[Beta/Early Access]
description:
This game is in devlopment feel free to comment features!

This game will be released in the future

There will be performance issues and bugs like in the first level i will fix it later

There will be a small amount of features no settings menu

btw this game is a test on how can i use vRoid with unity

right now this game will only be avalible for 64 bit windows computers :C

Controls:

Movement: W A S D

Jump:Space

Quit Game:Esc

This is game is quite hard to run and get stable fps im using a RTX2060(Mobile)

And an i5 10300H and I Managed to get 15-80 Fps so dont expect stable fps

Minimum Specs:

Cpu:i3 9-Gen

Gpu:Gtx 1650Ti  

Ram:6-8 GB

Storage 330MB

Recommended Specs:

Cpu:i5 10-Gen

Gpu:RTX 2060Ti(Mobile) GTX1080Ti(Desktop)

Ram:8-16 GB

Storage 330MB
